mapper.select: SELECT A.feed_id AS feedId, A.contents, A.location , A.created_at AS createdAt , B.user_id AS writerId , IF(B.nick_name IS NULL, B.uid, B.nick_name) AS writerNm , B.pic AS writerPic , IF(C.feed_id IS NULL, 0, 1) AS isLike FROM feed A INNER JOIN user B ON A.writer_user_id = B.user_id LEFT JOIN feed_like C ON A.feed_id = C.feed_id AND C.user_id = #{signedUserId} ORDER BY A.feed_id DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{size}
